item.title: Insuring the insurers: hospital capacity and prices
item.description: How does the concentration of capacity affects prices and how much are insurers willing to pay for it?

item.title: Smallpox eradication and the burden of anti-vaxxers
item.description: A quantification of the social cost of the anti-vaccination movement of 19th century England

item.title: Vertical Integration between Hospitals and Insurers
item.description:
With Jose Ignacio Cuesta and Carlos Noton

An analysis of the welfare effects of vertical integration between insurers and hospitals
